runs.comm: first ball of the tournament, with a very long run up, fully pitched just outside off, batsman tries for a drive but misses.
on the off stump with good length now, batsman goes on to the backfoot to glance towards square leg.
good length again, this time just a drive towards the bowler.
wide outside off, cuts towards backward point now for a single.
on to the legs now, batsman tries to steal a single through a push but fielder is too sharp.
a similar delivery with good length again, and the batsman again fails to take a single due to sharp fielding at short  leg, good first over for Afghanistan.
good length on the off stump, batsman comes down the track and hammers this over extra cover, what a shot!
comes down the track again but this time just manages a touch while trying to drive to take it to the point.
just a straight drive with full length ball and a very quick single.
again trying to come down the wicket to try to pierce the fielders at cover but not managing to get the complete hold of it, towards the fielder at point.
beautiful shot this time, was almost a half volley and the batsman swings across the line and hammers it to midwicket
pulls this time a half volley, but fielder there stopping extra runs.
just a push towards mid off for a single to start the over.
half volley, batsman goes onto the back-foot and hooks this beautifully.
excellent cover drive now, no chance for the fielder, good start by UAE.
tries to pull again but mistiming takes it just past the bowler.
wide outside off stump now, a well judged leave.
fully pitched on the off stump and batsman plays this over the head of the bowler, one bounce four.
spin into the attack, tries for just a push towards square leg but misses the bat..
comes to front-foot to drive towards short cover now.
little bit of wrist work down the leg for a quick single.
a solid block of a fully pitched delivery now.
just a touch of the bat and the ball goes past the keeper pretty fast  to pick up a boundary.
a single towards cover now.
huge six this time, half volley and the batsman hammers this over square leg.
just a front -foot drive for no run.
flicks beautifully this time towards leg, nice shot.
another six in the over, another half volley sent over mid wicket, excellent stuff this is from Rohan.
outside off, batsman decides to leave this.
a block this time to the bowler.
flick towards the deep square leg now for a single.
tries to play a drive but misses now.
reverse sweep now, fielder ran to chase down but the ball traveled faster towards the third man.
a cover drive this time for a single.
flicks this towards backward square leg, chased won from right in front of the ropes.
over the cow corner, was fully pitched and the batsman hit with the middle of the bat perfectly.
tries to flick but top edge falls just short of the short cover.
a push towards extra cover now for a single.
outside off, lately cut towards short third man for a very quick single.
again to the same fielder who is at short fine leg now for the lefty, no run though this time.
a solid block now of the delivery with good length.
a push towards square leg to end the over.
fully pitched, tries to get a huge lofted shot but misses to connect properly only to get the ball right in front of him.
dropped, batsman hammers this over extra cover but fielder is there who attempts for a catch and drops a rather easy one, poor fielding.
a drive towards mid on now for a single.
tries to play a drive but misses, so does the keeper resulting in bye runs.
a back-foot block now of the good length delivery.
tries to steal a single there through a push towards mid-off but no chance.
what a shot, fully pitched and Rohan sat down on the feet to play a slog sweep, wonderful shot.
tries to cut it making room but mistiming taking it nowhere.
tries to cut past the keeper now but little bit of edge of the pad.
a quick single through a push towards short.
tries to go for a big shot with a fully pitched delivery but was nowhere near the line, breakthrough for Afghanistan finally.
little bit of bounce now, batsman goes on the back-foot to glance for a single.
comes out of the wicket to play a square drive this time.
comes down again and plays a lofted shot towards long on fielder who jumps and takes the catch but then drops.
hammered this over cover now, Rohan is on fire.
just a single towards short leg.
he comes into the party now, comes down the track and plays a beautiful square drive.
and a single past the bowler to end half of the innings, very good stage for UAE to post a huge total.
just a touch towards off and runs quickly, 100 comes up.
another on-drive for a quick single.
a solid block now of the good length delivery.
makes room and tries to pierce the fielder at deep mid wicket and square leg but well fielded just in front of the ropes.
a cover drive now, well stopped again from just in front of the ropes.
just a push towards leg now and good running between the wickets.
cuts late towards point.
square drive this time for another one.
flicks towards the same fielder but no scope for running.
off drive this time towards long off.
flicks it towards the square leg fielder now.
another single to end the over.
tries to go for a big shot but misses.
what a shot this is! It was fully pitched and the batsman sits on the feet to hammer this over cow corner.
into the same zone again, but this time just for a couple.
was that a reverse pull ?! Rohan tries to find a boundary of each ball but the fielder stopped that well at square leg.
tries to flick this time but hit on the pads.
he tries to clear the long off fielder but only manages to take it to his hands.
good length, batsman goes on the back-foot to drive past the short cover.
tries to hammer this over square leg now but can't get the complete hold of it, good catch to stop Rohan who was on fire since the very beginning.
on the back-foot pull towards third man now.
comes on to the front-foot this time to take it towards long on.
play and a miss, looking for big shot.
another miss going for a similar shot, UAE are desperate for runs now.
on-drive towards the long-off fielder.
another drive to the same fielder for a quick single.
tries to cut past the short third man now but can't manage, only a single.
a back-foot block this time of the good length delivery.
cuts it towards the point.
fully pitched on the middle stump, batsman tries to play a flick but misses, good shout and given by the umpire.
into the last 5 overs now, cuts it lately past the keeper.
this time a good looking cover drive, but only for a single.
flicks it towards the mid wicket now.
square drive this time for a quick single.
tries to steal another single but no chance there.
hammers this though the cover now, beautiful shot.
fully pitched outside off, goes for a lofted drive but thick edge takes it towards third man.
half volley on the middle stump and the batsman puts his massive power to pull this over deep mid wicket, unbelievable power that is.
just a square drive now to rotate the strike.
goes for a huge shot towards leg side but misses.
that went far out of the ground into the gallery, fully pitched on the middle stump and the bowler saw it going past his head straight away.
yorker length now, manages to get under it somehow.
just a single towards cover.
wide outside off, goes for a drive but misses and so does the keeper.
pulls this towards deep mid-wicket, fielder running hard but not getting there in the end.
cuts this time towards point.
flicks this time hard, but only for a single.
plays it straight now past the bowler.
goes for a big shot again but mistiming takes it to the long off.
comes down the track to play it towards long-off fielder, but fumbling makes it a double.
another double now through the cover, good running.
just a push towards cover now for a single.
plays it as straight as an arrow now piercing the fielder at long on and log off, beautiful shot.
fully pitched, goes for a flick but misses.
tries to play it over mid-on but can't do it, only a single.
wide outside off, batsman left it alone hoping for a wide but no extra there.
tries to play past the bowler now and take a run but no chance there.
goes for a big shot but mistimed to take it just in front of the fielder at short.
a quick single through the mid on now.
last ball, goes for a desperate drive but mistiming again. That's the end of UAE's innings, 177 is the target for Afghanistan.
